channel.title: [PI] Zammy Boss Glitched [PI]
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape Community,
On our server Project X, we are having a small issue with God Wars Dungeon.
ISSUE: When you go into Zammy's Dungeon you can see his minions perfectly, but the Boss itself can't be seen 95% of the time. In a blink you see the Boss but a second later it disappears but the NPC is still there because when you right click it you can still attack it. You just can't see it.
So if anyone can help me resolve this issue, it is greatly appreciated.
Thanks in advance, Project X.

item.title: [PI] Zammy Boss Glitched [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Project-X Project-X
item.description:
@Project-X wrote:

We took out all the animations, and it didn’t help.

Read full topic

It’s probably the animations it’s doing.

item.title: [PI] Zammy Boss Glitched [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Project-X Project-X
item.description:
@Project-X wrote:

Hello Moparscape Community,

 On our server Project X, we are having a small issue with God Wars Dungeon.

ISSUE:
When you go into Zammy’s Dungeon you can see his minions perfectly, but the Boss itself can’t be seen 95% of the time. In a blink you see the Boss but a second later it disappears but the NPC is still there because when you right click it you can still attack it. You just can’t see it.

So if anyone can help me resolve this issue, it is greatly appreciated.

Thanks in advance,
Project X.
